about_the_game:
All you have to do in this game is get your boat in the air and rotate it to make score. The goal is to try to get the highest score!
There's also a simple set of challenges included with the game to get you started and interested if you need bite sized goals set by the developer (me).
After that it's entirely on you, the player, to make your own goal of making a high score in the default mode, or to beat the challenge list as fast as possible, etc.

Features:
  • 10 hand-crafted challenges.
  • A singular ship.
  • Ability to rotate on all 6 axes.
  • Combos.
  • Score modifier pickupables.
  • Dragon curve fractal skybox.

Lastly, this game was written entirely from scratch. In other words, I haven't used any pre-made game engine so the large majority of every line of assembly code that's ran is ran with love :)
detailed_description:
All you have to do in this game is get your boat in the air and rotate it to make score. The goal is to try to get the highest score!
There's also a simple set of challenges included with the game to get you started and interested if you need bite sized goals set by the developer (me).
After that it's entirely on you, the player, to make your own goal of making a high score in the default mode, or to beat the challenge list as fast as possible, etc.

Features:
  • 10 hand-crafted challenges.
  • A singular ship.
  • Ability to rotate on all 6 axes.
  • Combos.
  • Score modifier pickupables.
  • Dragon curve fractal skybox.

Lastly, this game was written entirely from scratch. In other words, I haven't used any pre-made game engine so the large majority of every line of assembly code that's ran is ran with love :)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Manjaro 21.2
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10300H @ 2.50GHZ
  • Memory: 8600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Just make sure that your graphics card supports OpenGL 3.2! Furthermore, this should run on lower end machines but I don't have many to test on so I wrote my specs...

name: Funmi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10300H @ 2.50GHZ
  • Memory: 8600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You really should be able to run this game on lower spec hardware than what is indicated so long as your hardware supports OpenGL 3.2 and or Directx12 and are on Windows 10; I just don't have access to many test machines.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Rotate the boat in mid-air to make high scores in this colorfully cute game!
